title: AppleCryptoStore

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Iâ€™m interested to know how does warranty of this item works in case I purchase it overseas. Will the warranty will work on our local apple service center? Lastly, what about tax and shipping cost? Can you give some estimates. Iâ€™m from Philippines.Regarding the escrow, do you mean forum escrow right? Iâ€™m interested to purchase since this model is not yet available in my country and the price on your store is way lower than local price here.

comments.author: AppleCryptoStore
comments.body: On our website, you can find detailed information about our warranty and purchase terms. Additionally, you can engage with our real-time online support to get answers to all your questions. To place an order on our website, our support team will calculate the shipping cost and add it to the final payment. Of course, the warranty will be valid at all Apple stores; our products are genuine

comments.author: Beparanf
comments.body: Quote from: AppleCryptoStore on September 23, 2023, 12:41:01 PMOn our website, you can find detailed information about our warranty and purchase terms. Additionally, you can engage with our real-time online support to get answers to all your questions. To place an order on our website, our support team will calculate the shipping cost and add it to the final payment. Of course, the warranty will be valid at all Apple stores; our products are genuineÂ  What about escrow? Are you willing to accept orders made here in the forum and use local forum escrow on our deal? Iâ€™m not familiar with your website while the amount involved is huge for me to risk in online transaction.I will read on warranty later once you accept orders made here in the forum. We can use @minerjones as escrow since he is the most trusted here on handling deals like this. Letâ€™s PM.

Upgrade your tech game today!" ðŸ’»ðŸŒŸPromo Code for a 5% Discount: 'BITCOINTALK' - Limited to the first 10 users.OP with a brand new account.The domain applecrypto.store was registered 1 week ago.https://imgur.com/a/wQQkjQqHe wants to take advantage of the hype around the iPhone 15 so he can scam some people.When you click the "Order" button on a product page you are redirected to another domain bridge-applecrypto.store wich was registered yesterday 26 Sept 2023https://imgur.com/a/11Yz3lzOnce redirected there you are presented with a connect wallet pagehttps://imgur.com/a/QAlDmL3Considering all of the above -Â  do the math yourself.... my opinion is 100% scam, don't bother asking him about escrow because he wont accept it ,and don't connect your wallet to that website

comments.author: SMB
comments.body: Correct it is a 100% scam deal.

comments.author: alterra57
comments.body: You have the 1TB version for 1130 USD but it is 1500 USD on Apple's website. Typical red flag.
